long_description: Smith Gibson sunglasses give your eyes old school style with new school protection. Carbonic TLT lenses provide 100% UVA/B/C protection and incorporate Smith Tapered Lens Technology(TM) to optimize viewing clarity. Tapered Lens Technology contours the thickness of the lens so that light travels through without distortion-what you see is what you get. 6 base-curve lens: the higher the number the more curved the lens-Smith features sunglasses with 6, 7, 8 and 9 base curvature. Grilamid(R) TR90 lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact resistant. Lightweight frames have a medium fit with medium coverage. Smith Gibson polarized sunglasses include a protective case.
short_description: Smith Gibson sunglasses give your eyes old school style with new school protection.
